video.title: The Office
video.synopsis: Set at a dysfunctional paper company, this caustic British mockumentary follows the day-to-day troubles of the firm's uninspired desk jockeys.

episodes.synopsis: At Wernham Hogg, David hires a new temp. Tim hides Gareth's stapler in jelly, and Dawn gets busted for stealing supplies.
episodes.title: Downsize

episodes.synopsis: The discovery of an email bearing David's naked image -- albeit doctored -- distracts everyone from doing actual work.
episodes.title: Work Experience

episodes.synopsis: After receiving a gift from Dawn, Tim attends Quiz Night, where he matches wits with David and his friend Chris Finch.
episodes.title: The Quiz

episodes.synopsis: To boost morale, David's musical meeting brings everyone together. Everyone but Dawn and Lee, who have a horrible fight.
episodes.title: Training

episodes.synopsis: David hires a pretty blonde secretary. Meanwhile, at an after-hours outing, Gareth gets lucky with a married woman.
episodes.title: New Girl

episodes.synopsis: Gareth's job title is at risk when David agrees to sacrifice the Slough branch in exchange for a promotion.
episodes.title: Judgement

episodes.synopsis: The new arrivals from the Swindon branch include a rival for David, a "token black guy" and a woman in a wheelchair.
episodes.title: Merger

episodes.synopsis: David suspects the Swindon employees don't like him. But it appears that his rival Neil has won over everyone.
episodes.title: Appraisals

episodes.synopsis: Sex toys invade Trudy's birthday party. David feel desperate when he sees that even Finchy is friends with Neil.
episodes.title: Party

episodes.synopsis: Hired to talk about public speaking, David pulls out all the stops. Gareth seems to have found a kindred spirit.
episodes.title: Motivation

episodes.synopsis: At the Comic Relief Day charity event, David isn't laughing when told that his position has become redundant.
episodes.title: Charity

episodes.synopsis: Tim vows to tell Dawn exactly how he feels. David resorts to groveling to try to keep his job.
episodes.title: Interview

episodes.synopsis: David Brent is now a sales rep for a cleaning company and makes celebrity appearances. Gareth is now in charge of running things at the office.
episodes.title: Christmas Special: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: David finds a date for the office Christmas party. The team dances and drinks the night away while Tim wonders if he'll ever see Dawn again.
episodes.title: Christmas Special: Part 2
